From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

As soon as Condor opens his eyes, the first thing he can see is a white
metalic fist held up about a foot from his head. Within seconds of seeing
the eyes strugle, the owner of the fist, Beastbox, brings it down into the
face of Condor, as hard as he can.

In the corner Megatron had just entered the room with Beastbox, and Scourge
probably just behind him, he wasnt sure. Megatron sat down in one of the
chairs in Switchblade's room, and crossed his legs, looking forward to the
show. "Switchblade, Scourge, Fireblade, you have the best seats in the
house. Before I left Cybertron, 4 millions years ago, Beastbox was one of
the Decepticons main interrogaters. Unfortunately he has a short fuse, and
most robots he interrogates dont survive long enough to give us the
information, he has kept his position due to pure entertainment he
delivers" Megatron finishes, with a smile crossing his face.
